definition: Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China

sentences.english: This paper introduced the characteristics and its higy-yielding oultural techniques of "Chuanbei 1".
sentences.chinese: 该文主要介绍了川贝1号的特征特性及栽培技术要点。

sentences.english: An HPLC-ESI/MS method was developed for analysis of alkaloids in Bulbus Fritillariae.
sentences.chinese: 此方法可用于对市场上川贝母和浙贝母的质量监控。

sentences.english: I plan to buy some herb Chuan Bei tomorrow to put together with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 明天我打算买点川贝，自制冰糖川贝炖雪梨。

sentences.english: I plan to buy some herb Chuan Bei tomorrow to put together with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 明天我打算买点川贝，自制冰糖川贝炖雪梨。

definition: dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
Pei Pa Koa, proprietary cough syrup made with traditional Chinese herbs
monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
orange peel/tangerine peel/dried orange peel used in Chinese medicine
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
